findings.title: Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Using the SafeMath library is unnecessary as Solidity versions 0.8.0 and above have native arithmetic operations that revert to underflow and overflow.

findings.title: Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Declaring state variables as immutable can save gas when defined.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity style guide for naming conventions.

findings.title: Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can make a contract more difficult to understand and maintain, and increase the size of the contract.

findings.title: Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured with user-supplied input without proper checks for zero values.
